rows.label: tlk70000071_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The Holy Grail holds unspeakable power...
It's scary when you think about it.

rows.label: tlk70000071_03_msg0002
rows.name:
This time only the capital was
attacked, and they came out of it
relatively unscathed.

rows.label: tlk70000071_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I think you'll have heard this, but there
have been plenty of villages attacked
across Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000071_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And it's not just the work of the Holy Grail
either. A lot of people have taken the
opportunity to inflict misery on others.

rows.label: tlk70000071_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Not that I'm looking for justice or
anything, but when I hear those
stories it really rattles me...
